{"id":435245723,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1609096690,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/435245723/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int A[260];\n        for(int i = 0; i <= 257; i++)A[i] = 0;\n        int l = 0, r = 0,Max = 0;\n        s +='?';\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){\n            if(i==s.size()-1){\n                Max = max(r-l,Max);continue;\n            }\n            if(A[(int)s[i]]){\n                Max = max(Max,r-l);\n                for(int j = l; ;j++){\n                    if(s[i]==s[j]){l = j + 1;break;}\n                    A[(int)s[j]] = 0;\n                }\n                \n            }\n            A[(int)s[i]] = 1;\n            r++;\n        }\n        return {Max};\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
